headline: STERIS (STE) Appoints Karen L. Burton As New CFO Following Resignation
summary: STERIS (STE) saw an 12% increase in its share price over the past week, a period marked by significant corporate developments and strong earnings results. The company announced the appointment of Karen L. Burton as the new CFO following Michael J. Tokich's resignation, which could have implications for investor sentiment given the shakeup in the financial leadership. Furthermore, revised earnings guidance indicated higher expected revenue growth, potentially boosting investor confidence...
